Package ifscarsservice

Class IfsCarService

  • java.lang.Object
    • ifscarsservice.IfsCarService
  • public class IfsCarService
extends java.lang.Object
    The class who handles the implementation of IfsCarService Web Service.

        public int[] getVehicleIds​(boolean availableForSale)

        Parameters:
        availableForSale - false: all vehicles / true: only available for sale vehicles
        Returns:
        the Id list of all vehicles or of available for sale vehicles
